name: Crossroads (Mayara Barros)
description:
A game about discovering yourself through friendship and exploration, about respecting boundaries.

It's a cozy game, with no pressure and no danger.

  • 13 possible endings, including a hidden one.

To experience the final version of this game with the art, please consider buying the full game.

Other Ways to Show Support:

  • Tell your friends about this game!
  • Leave a comment/rating here!
  • Check the short stories I have available on my profile!
  • Support more content from me by joining my Patreon!
